| HistoryText             = A group formed by circumstance when [[Theodore Sallis (Earth-616)|Man-Thing]] found himself driven to an uncontrollable rage, caused by the immense levels of fear generated by the [[Cul Borson (Earth-616)|Serpent]]'s [[Worthy (Earth-616)|hammer-wielders]] across the world.{{r|Fear Itself: Fearsome Four #1}} Facing various alternate universe heroes and the [[Psycho-Man (Earth-616)|Psycho-Man]], brought to Earth by the Man-Thing's connection to the [[Nexus of All Realities]], the four were eventually able to confront their own fears and calm the Man-Thing, bringing an end to his rampage and saving the world, before going their separate ways.{{r|Fear Itself: Fearsome Four #1|4}}
